title: Just One More Dance: A Story of Degradation and Fear, Faith and Compassion from a Survivor of the Nazi Death Camps
description: This is a firsthand testimony of events in April 1944. While the German war effort was crumbling, the Nazi's pet project—the final solution—was on schedule. Ernest Levy was transported to the concentration camp at Birkenau, and this is his story of degradation and punishment, humanity, bravery, and survival.
author: Ernest Levy
